title: Mazatlan: A Jack Novak Thriller
description: Mazatlan, the first novel by E. Howard Hunt in a new "P. S. Donoghue" series, introduces ex-DEA agent Jack Novak, an updated Travis McGee with the author's insider knowledge of undercover operations. Novak is hired to find a TV evangelist who has disappeared midway through a tour of Central America. The trail takes him to Mazatlan, Mexico, and leads to a blaze of gunfire, with bursts of sensuality, all played out in the uncharted waters of a war against drug kingpins.
author: P. S. Donoghue
